title: 'Affordable Immersion: Great Monitor for Non-Gamers'
body: This monitor, while not ideal for gaming, pleasantly surprised me considering its price. The picture quality is excellent, with vibrant colors and sharp details. However, it's not designed for gaming enthusiasts. What sets this monitor apart is the curved screen, which creates an immersive experience for watching movies and series. If you're not a hardcore gamer and want an affordable monitor for everyday tasks and media consumption, this one is worth considering.

title: 'NEVER BUY OUTDATED MONITORS'
body: 'Never buy outdated Monitors. This is a garbage product. No sound support
column6: no Samsung support. Amazon will sell garbage too. We have to decide whether to buy from Amazon or any realistically support vendors. Hopeless experience with Amazon India and Amazon support. Samsung already badly well known about their after sales service. Approaching them is a nightmare. The Toll free number provided with the product is not the correct one - as expected. You cannot call Samsung you cannot approach them via website. Horrible experience indeed and Lessons learned.'

title: 'Basic Monitor for everyday usage'
body: Loved the curvy aspect at this price point. There is no color bleeding. It's extremely light weight to the extent where I can't even turn on my fan at top speed. The monitor comes with a manual, adapter, and a HDMI cable. Clarity of the letters and words are very average. Monitor is slightly tiltable but there is no height adjustment. Overall its decent for everyday usage but if you have to work long hours, not a good choice.

title: 'Dont buy Audio output is not working'
body: 'Dont buy this product. I received this product yesterday. And noticed that Monitors Audio output is not working. I tried all the recommendation guidelines. When I tried to return. Amazon return policy option is not at all allowing to upload and reach CALL ME option. Looks Amazon Return process also technically worse. I AM STILL EVEN STRUGGLING TO RAISE RETURN REQUEST. Very customer support interface. IF ANY CUSTOMER CARE REPRESENTATIVE NOTICE THIS PLEASE CONSIDER THIS AS A ISSUE AND CALL ME.'

title: 'Initial impressions
